title: In a Lonely Place
description: When a creative entrepreneur abruptly leaves his business for an international surfing adventure, his family’s worry turns into suspicion. After investigators take a closer look, they begin to wonder, what happened to him? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on December 14, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
